title: Magic Spells Sound Pack
description: A sound library of magical spells containing 400 sound effects, including 22 types of spells - healing, black, fire, water, freeze, earth, portal, mind, mutation, scroll, light, potion and others.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/magic-spells-sound-pack

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/xedd84phamlyobv/MSE%20-%20Magic%20Spells%20Sound%20Pack_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


A collection of magical spells containing 22 types of spells.


The library includes 400 sound effects divided into 22 folders for each type of magic:


  1. The "Black" folder contains 10 magical spells
  2. The "Dark" folder contains 15 magical spells
  3. The «Earth» folder contains 10 magical spells
  4. The «Electro» folder contains 25 magical spells
  5. The «Energy» folder contains 20 magical spells
  6. The «Fail» folder contains 10 magical spells
  7. The «Fire» folder contains 15 magical spells
  8. The «Freeze» folder contains 15 magical spells
  9. The «Healing» folder contains 50 magical spells
  10. The «Inferno» folder contains 15 magical spells
  11. The «Light» folder contains 35 magical spells
  12. The «Magnetic» folder contains 10 magical spells
  13. The «Mind» folder contains 10 magical spells
  14. The «Mutation» folder contains 10 magical spells
  15. The «Portal» folder contains 25 magical spells
  16. The «Potion» folder contains 20 magical spells
  17. The «Restoration» folder contains 20 magical spells
  18. The «Scroll» folder contains 15 magical spells
  19. The «Shield» folder contains 20 magical spells
  20. The «Shots» folder contains 25 magical spells
  21. The «Special» folder contains 5 magical spells
  22. The «Water» folder contains 20 magical spells


Use this asset to create magical spells for mages, shamans, good and evil wizards in your game scenes, or use these spells to produce sound for individual gameplay events.


You can also mix sound effects with each other to create even more sound variations.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 400 sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 22 types of spells
  • 50 healing spells
  • 25 portal spells
  • 25 electro spells
  • 20 potion spells
  • 15 fire spells
  • 35 light spells
  • 25 magic shots
  • 20 magical shields and more
  • great for RPGs, strategies, casual games in the Fantasy, Dark Fantasy genre


Number of Audio Waves: 400

Number of Audio Cues: 400

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 23 minutes 15 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
